pullrequest.title: add code to set SimbodyCollision::collisionShape and SimbodyCollision::GetBoundingBox()

content.raw:
If I remember right, we are using a TriangleMesh ContactGeometry 
to implement both Box and Cylinder because Simbody doesn't 
currently have those as built-ins (because they aren't smooth).
So I think it is probably the missing method from TriangleMesh that
is breaking things. I can add calcSupportPoint() for TriMesh asap but
it won't return a very tight point just yet.
content.html: If I remember right, we are using a TriangleMesh ContactGeometry to implement both Box and Cylinder because Simbody doesn't currently have those as built-ins (because they aren't smooth). So I think it is probably the missing method from TriangleMesh that is breaking things. I can add calcSupportPoint() for TriMesh asap but it won't return a very tight point just yet.
